entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:06 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, 2.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
